>Beastbox growls at another attempt to throw him off, but to do so, this
>Maximal will need to rip off his back, he thought to himself. He lowered
>his compression barrels into Firearms back, and fire four times, (eight
>shots). "Dont fight Maximal, Beastbox end this fight quick" he said
>savagely.

OOC: Yo Yanshosh, ignore this post, and just change the eight shots to 4, I
realize I went overboard, so I just fire twice. Oaky?
